title: Canaan Online Shop
author: Canaan Online Shop
content: New ArrivalA1346 series are available now.Trail order is acceptable https://shop.canaan.io/products/avalon-miner-a1346-113t-3300w

comments.author: Canaan Online Shop
comments.body: All Avalon Miners are still on a big salehttps://shop.canaan.io/products/

comments.author: kano
comments.body: Do these miners have #xnsub in them?That is a major security risk since it allows where you are mining, to send you any random work at any time, for even any coin, any account, literally anything at all, without the miner ever reporting that.The Nicehash implementation specifically hides this information.

comments.author: Canaan Online Shop
comments.body: Quote from: kano on November 28, 2022, 05:47:35 AMDo these miners have #xnsub in them?That is a major security risk since it allows where you are mining, to send you any random work at any time, for even any coin, any account, literally anything at all, without the miner ever reporting that.The Nicehash implementation specifically hides this information.Aha, it sounds professional, do you have more info about this, we can confirm with our technician team, thanks.

comments.author: kano
comments.body: That is what the #xnsub change does - removes the restriction on allowing the 'pool' to change the work.

comments.author: Canaan Online Shop
comments.body: Quote from: kano on November 30, 2022, 09:35:02 AMThat is what the #xnsub change does - removes the restriction on allowing the 'pool' to change the work.Noted with thanks, we will confirm with our technician team.
